Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the given euler angles and translation vector. 7. Extrude the 2D sketch towards the positive Z-axis by 0.5 units using the given 'sketch_scale' factor. The resulting part is the first intermediate part that contributes to the final CAD model.</description>
